channel.title: [317]Help with this, how to use a item with another item then get 1 item?
channel.description:
I need help for this like
Use a item with another item and it gives you like another item but only 1 like combining flour with water gives dough, just as example, but how would i get the thing to do this? anyone help pls.

item.title: [317]Help with this, how to use a item with another item then get 1 item?
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

you mean like this?

if(((itemUsed == 2953) || (otherItem == 2953)) && ((itemUsed == 2516) || (otherItem == 2953))){ deleteItem(2953, 1); deleteItem(2516, 1); addItem(2307, 1); sM("You mix the grain with water and make bread dough"); }

i just replaced the item ids with the correct ones you needed, for dough. you can change em if u want[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 12, 2009, 07:58:06 pm[/size][hr][quote=“mandood77, post:2, topic:308230”][quote author=Skillapwnz link=topic=404360.msg2993061#msg2993061 date=1255395015]
I need help for this like

Use a item with another item and it gives you like another item but only 1 like combining flour with water gives dough, just as example, but how would i get the thing to do this? anyone help pls.
[/quote] Search bar, this topic was posted a qouple of days ago, check around, you’ll fiind it[/quote]

Nice spelling, and the answer isn’t always to use the search bar. Giving help is easier than to make the person search all over forums for 1 simple thing.

Read full topic
